post.title: harmony 880 deal on the web
post.content: fyi, hopefully, i am not violating any rules in this specific group. just to let you know, a friend pointed me to this harmony 880 deal on the web (approx less that $100 ar. expires june 8.) : http://www.buy.com/retail/coupon.asp?prid=80605356 too bad i already have the 720 and 659.
